headline: Revvity: Not A Healthy Diagnosis For This Life Science Business
summary: Revvity continues to struggle post-pandemic, with poor capital allocation and stagnant business performance leading to several lost years. See why RVTY stock is a Hold.

headline: Revvity Inc (RVTY) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Software Growth and Strategic Share ...
summary: Revvity Inc (RVTY) surpasses EPS expectations with robust software performance, while navigating challenges in the Diagnostics segment and adjusting growth outlook.
